entity.archeryexp.diamond_arrow.descript: It's tipped in diamond, strengthening it considerably.
entity.archeryexp.gold_arrow.description: The golden tip glimmers in the light, but it is not very durable.
item.archeryexp.diamond_arrow.descriptio: It's tipped in diamond, strengthening it considerably.
item.archeryexp.gold_arrow.description: The golden tip glimmers in the light, but it is not very durable.
item.archeryexp.diamond_bow.description: This bow is sturdy and crystalline, though it draws slowly
item.archeryexp.gold_bow.description: A gilded bow quite capable of quick-draws.
item.archeryexp.iron_bow.description: A hardy bow which is rather middle of the range, yet durable.
item.archeryexp.netherite_bow.descriptio: The dark metal glints greedily at the hilt and string notches. Powerful.
